Package index

All functions

FMT_KOs
Snippet of the untransformed inferred functional data from the FMT Aging study.
FMT_metab
Snippet of the CLR-transformed hippocampal metabolomics data from the FMT Aging study.
FMT_metadata
Snippet of the metadata from the FMT Aging study.
KO_member_dic
Dictionary to link KEGG orthologues based on their pathway membership.
KO_translation
Lookup table to convert KEGG orthologue (KO) IDs to their human-readable counterparts
anansi()
Calculate an association network
anansi.p.adjust()
Handle FDR methods for anansi.
anansiCor()
Compute r-statistics for each featureY-featureX pair in the dictionary. Typically, the main anansi() function will run this for you.
anansiCorPvalue()
Compute r-statistics for each featureY-featureX pair in the dictionary. Typically, the main anansi() function will run this for you.
anansiCorTestByGroup()
Run correlations for all interacting metabolites and functions.
anansiDiffCor()
Run differential correlation analysis for all interacting metabolites and functions.
anansiTale-class
An S4 class to contain all anansi stats results so that they can easily be extracted.
anansiWeb-class
anansiWeb S4 container class
`$`(<anansiWeb>) `$<-`(<anansiWeb>) dimnames(<anansiWeb>) terms(<anansiWeb>)
Accessing and modifying information in anansiWeb S4 class
anansi_compute_clr()
compute CLR using Aitchison's method
anansi_dic
Dictionary to link KEGG compounds to KEGG orthologues
clr_imputed()
Resample random values, perform CLR over each iteration and return the median result.
clr_lite() clr_c() clr_unif() clr_logunif()
Impute zeroes and perform a centered log-ratio (CLR) transformation
cpd_translation
Lookup table to convert KEGG compound IDs to their human-readable counterparts
frame.tale()
Extract information from an anansiTale object and parse it into a neat table
getAnansi()
anansi wrapper for the MultiAssayExperiment class
getWeb(<MultiAssayExperiment>)
weaveWeb wrapper for the MultiAssayExperiment class
graph_from_link()
make an igraph mapping across the content of link
impute_zeroes()
Replace zeroes with non-zero values in order to perform a CLR-transformation
is.categorical()
Is character, factor or ordered factor
ec2ko ec2cpd kegg_link()
Use linking data from the KEGG database.
named_group_list()
Provide name and levels for categories for group terms
named_term_list()
Provide name and levels for categories
plotAnansi()
Dissociation plot
softmax()
Undo CLR transformation with softmax
web(<formula>) web(<default>) as_web() kegg_web() weaveWeb()
Make an anansiWeb
